name: kiesan
message: My work in the court system requires me to stay seated until court is finished. This could be a 4-5 hour stint. I don't gain any weight but my back is stuffed, and I think my job may be 'in part' to blame. When I get home I collapse onto the couch before moving onto chores around the house. Maybe a standing desk at home may help me.... Might be time to do some woodwork.
